name: p53 System
author: Naama Geva-Zatorsky <naama_gz@technion.ac.il>
description: The negative feedback loop between the tumor suppressor `p53´ and the oncogene `Mdm2´ results in an oscillatory behavior following exposure to gamma irradiation. The parameters `k´ are reaction rate constants and `pMdm2´ is the `Mdm2´ precursor.

properties.name: RareEvent1
properties.description: The probability to reach a concentration of p53 greater than 120 within <= 5 time units

properties.name: RareEvent2
properties.description: The probability to reach a concentration of 0 for Mdm2 within <= 100 time units

properties.name: RareEvent3
properties.description: The probability to reach a concentration of p53, pMdm2 and Mdm2 >150 within <= 100 time units

properties.name: Steady1
properties.description: Long-run probability to reach a concentration of 0 for p53

conversion.note: since PRISM files with unbounded integers can currently not be parsed, bounds have been introduced manually and removed afterwards
